scripts.dev: npm run prod:stop && cd docker/development && docker compose up --build
scripts.prod: npm run dev:stop && cd docker/production && docker compose up --build
scripts.dev:stop: echo 'Stopping Dev Containers' && cd docker/development && docker compose stop && echo 'Stopped All Dev Containers'
scripts.prod:stop: echo 'Stopping Prod Containers' && cd docker/production && docker compose stop && echo 'Stopped All Prod Containers'
scripts.docker:stop: echo 'Stopping all envs' && npm run dev:stop && npm run prod:stop && echo 'Stopped all Containers'
